scripts.install-all: npm install && cd source/site && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && bundler install --quiet
scripts.dev: cd source && del Gemfile.lock >nul 2>&1 && start "AUTORELOAD: Jekyll" cmd /c "jekyll build -w" && cd site && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run install-all && cd source/site && webpack -p --progress --colors --config ./webpack.config.js && cd .. && jekyll build
scripts.build: cd source/site && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cd .. && bundler install --quiet && cross-env NODE_ENV=production jekyll build
